DOC.brief_title: Sirolimus Eluting Stents Complex Coronary Lesions ( SCANDSTENT )
DOC.criteria: Stable , unstable angina and/or objective sign myocardial ischaemia Lesions de novo locate native vessel diameter > 2.25 mm . Complex lesion include least one follow characteristic : Ostial location ( < 5 mm ostium ) Total occlusion length ≥ 15 mm Bifurcational ( side branch > 1.75 mm diameter ) Angulated ( > 45° within lesion ) Patients : Other severe disease expect survival < 1 year Other significant cardiac disease Known allergy paclitaxel , clopidogrel stainless steel . Myocardial infarction within 3 day index procedure Linguistic difficulty need interpreter Renal insufficiency ( pcreatinine > 200 micromol/l ) Gastrointestinal bleeding within 1 month Childbearing potential pregnancy Participation another study Lesions : Unprotected leave main disease Restenosis Lesions contain visible thrombus Treatment modality balloon stent ( ablation , brachytherapy , ultrasound ) connection index procedure Diffuse coronary disease distal treat lesion Heavily calcification Lesion locate saphenous vein graft
